document.full_text: andy murray suffered a shock 6-1 7-5 loss to american qualifier alex bogomolov in the second round of the sony ericsson open on friday, continuing his miserable start to the united states hardcourt season.
document.title: misery for andy murray after another defeat by a qualifier
lines_and_colors: andy murray suffered a shock 6-1 7-5 loss to american qualifier alex bogomolov in the second round of the sony ericsson open on friday, continuing his miserable start to the united states hardcourt season.
